titleInfo.title: SKF USA Inc. v. Zarwasch-Weiss et al
titleInfo.subTitle: 1327-NAV(G,W)Memorandum Opinion and Order. Defendants are prohibited from both selling to and buying from any entity on the SKF Economos customer list. Magistrate Judge Nancy A. Vecchiarelli on 4/19/2011. Associated Cases: 1:10-cv-01548-NAV, 1:10-cv-0

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 1:10-cv-01548; SKF USA Inc. v. Zarwasch-Weiss et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Northern District of Ohio
extension.docketText: 1327-NAV(G,W)Memorandum Opinion and Order. Defendants are prohibited from both selling to and buying from any entity on the SKF Economos customer list. Magistrate Judge Nancy A. Vecchiarelli on 4/19/2011. Associated Cases: 1:10-cv-01548-NAV, 1:10-cv-0

titleInfo.title: SKF USA Inc. v. Zarwasch-Weiss et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Findings of Fact&Conclusions of Law. The court awards plaintiff $125,878 in compensatory damages, $377,634 in punitive damages, and reasonable attorney's fees, costs, and expenses in an amount yet to be determined. Plaintiff's application for an award due within 30 days of this order. Defendant shall have 30 days from the filing of plaintiff's application to conduct discovery. Defendant's response due within 30 days after the close of discovery. Magistrate Judge Nancy A. Vecchiarelli on 10/3/2011. Associated Cases: 1:10-cv-01548-NAV, 1:10-cv-01327-NAV (G,W)

titleInfo.title: SKF USA Inc. v. Zarwasch-Weiss et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Order granting Motion of SKF USA for fees costs with modifications, awarding attorney's fees and costs in the amount of $157,374.48 pursuant to the Ohio Uniform Trade Secrets Act and $40,006.95 pursuant to 28 U.S.C. Section 1920. The court awards SKF USA and assesses against Zarwasch and Heza pursuant to the OUTSA attorney's fees and costs in the amount of $157,374.48. The court also awards SKF USA and assesses against Zarwasch and Heza pursuant to Section 1920 costs in the amount of $40,006.95 (Related Doc # (111)) in case 1:10-cv-01327-NAV; (Related Doc # (165)) in case 1:10-cv-01548-NAV. Magistrate Judge Nancy A. Vecchiarelli on 1/20/2012.Associated Cases: 1:10-cv-01327-NAV, 1:10-cv-01548-NAV(W,G)
